name: Bozo shooter
description: This game you can see the spin of the many things we where taught in class you can see the guy shooting and dying you will also have the NEW options to choose different ships get a fruit powerup after 5 mangos you go faster after 60 seconds you go to a boss battle survive as long as you can there is no win the challenge is get the best score you will also have to protect the small aliens on the way to there home if they both die you die  you can also get coins which help with your health and points update you can win just survive 60 sec in the boss battle
